title: Eclipx releases guidance for NZ$250m FP Ignition ABS - Nasdaq.com
text: SYDNEY, Sept 12 (IFR) - Eclipx Group, through its subsidiary Eclipx Fleet Holdings (ECX), has released initial guidance for the no-grow NZ$250m (US$161m) FP Ignition Series 2019-1 ABS offering, expected to launch and price next week.
ANZ and Westpac are joint lead managers.
